name: Bouncy Puddings
description:
Bouncy Puddings is an endless jumper game.

Bounce to new heights & unlock cute 'Pudding' characters!

Controls:

A, D / left, right arrow keys - to move Pudding

Spacebar - to activate Angel Pudding

Left mouse button - menu & buttons

also available on Google Play Store (link below)

:) Buy me a coffee if you like the game: ko-fi.com/pymaker
